data: Young Denis O’Shaughnessy was old Denis’s son; and old Denis, like many great men before him, was the son of his father and mother in particular, and a long line of respectable ancestors in general.

Going to Maynooth
Traits and Stories of the Irish Peasantry, The Works of William Carleton, Volume Three
